channel.title: redirection on uweb browser
channel.description: Recent content in redirection on uweb browser

item.title: Resource redirection
item.description: Click the following links to append mirrors to the file "default.redirect": github mirror:fastgit github mirror 2 google recaptcha mirror Each line of the file "default.redirect" has the following format: [domain name]:[regular expression]:[replacement expression] in which "[regular expression]" is as defined by java language, and cannot have ":" inside; if empty, it defaults to be same as "[domain name]". Ways to enable redirection: Long the image buttonã€‚ Long pressing the setting button, enable the option "url redirection".
